Name: Tales of Lagoona
About the game: Welcome to the magical undersea world of Lagoona, to the quaint town of Coral Bay. New Anemone Orphanage has fallen on hard times as the Coral Bay Beautification Society has deemed the old building a blight on the city. Islabelle the Mermaid is doing everything she can to save the children’s home, but she needs help. Explore a host of breathtaking underwater locations in search of thousands of objects. Sell your wares at Darby’s market in Coral Bay in real-time! You can even accept quests from people around town to earn extra money. There are over 150 quests and 160 minigames in all. You’ll meet a host of hilarious characters from Coral Bay including fish, sharks, turtles, mermaids, octopus, manta rays, and sea horses! Purchase upgrades for the orphanage and collect gems to unlock new rooms. Hidden objects are uniquely randomized so no scene is ever the same twice! Over 45 unique trophies to earn as you help Islabelle the Mermaid save the orphans!
